messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Whispering Woods Conundrum DATE: 10/10/49 The trial room was filled to capacity as everyone awaited the testimonies. The prosecution summoned the officers associated with the investigation to the stand. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and your role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Taylor, the lead investigator in this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Taylor. What was the nature of the incident under investigation? WITNESS: On the morning of May 5th, Officer C. D. Upton discovered an abandoned campsite in Whispering Woods with signs of a struggle. We initiated an investigation immediately. PROSECUTOR: Who handled the forensic analysis? WITNESS: Criminalist E. F. Vance and Technician G. H. Walker were responsible for the forensic examination. PROSECUTOR: Who carried out the interviews with the nearby residents and potential witnesses? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Xavier and K. L. Young conducted the interrogations. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense then proceeded to cross-examine Captain Taylor regarding the investigative procedures followed. In the proceedings, Patrol Officers M. N. Zane, O. P. Adams, and Q. R. Brooks were also called to the stand.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
